direction.raw_text: ...and these children that you spit on, as they try to change their worlds are immune to your consultations.  They're quite aware of what they're going through... - David Bowie" The Blank Screen and Title Card SHATTER to reveal... 1. EXT. SHERMER HIGH SCHOOL - DAY During Brian's monologue, we see various views of things inside the school including Bender's locker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saturday...March 24, 1984.  Shermer High School, Shermer, Illinois.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .  Dear Mr. Vernon...we accept the fact that we had to sacrifice a whole Saturday in detention for whatever it was that we did wrong, what we did was wrong.  But we think you're crazy to make us write this essay telling you who we think we are, what do you care?  You see us as you want to see us...in the simplest terms and the most convenient definitions.  You see us as a brain, an athelete, a basket case, a princess and a criminal. Correct?  That's the way we saw each other at seven o'clock this morning. We were brainwashed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe you can't get me out of this...I mean it's so absurd I have to be here on a Saturday! It's not like I'm a defective or anything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make it up to you...Honey, ditching class to go shopping doesn't make you a defective.  Have a good day. Claire rolls her eyes and gets out of the car and walks up the school front steps
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this the first time or the last time we do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well get in there and use the time to your advantage...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, we're not supposed to study; we just have to sit there and do nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well mister you figure out a way to study.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well go! Brian gets out of the car and walks towards the school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I screwed around...guys screw around, there's nothing wrong with that.  Except you got caught, Sport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Mom already reemed me, alright?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna miss a match?  You wanna blow your ride?  Now no school's gonna give a scholarship to a discipline case. Andrew gets out of the car and walks into the school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...well.  Here we are!  I want to congradulate you for being on time... Claire raises her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, sir?  I think there's been a mistake.  I know it's detention, but...um...I don't think I belong in here... Vernon doesn't care.  He just continues to talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is now seven-oh-six.  You have exactly eight hours and fifty-four minutes to think about why you're here.  To ponder the error of your ways... Bender spits into the air and catches the spit in his mouth again. Claire looks like she is going to gag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and you may not talk.  You will not move from these seats. He glances up at Bender and points at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and you... Vernon pulls the chair out from under Bender's feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...will not sleep.  Alright people, we're gonna try something a little different today.  We are going to write an essay--of no less than a thousand words--describing to me who you think you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this a test? Vernon passes out paper and pencils and takes no notice of Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And when I say essay...I mean essay. I do not mean a single word repeated a thousand times.  Is that clear Mr. Bender? Bender looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crystal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.  Maybe you'll learn a little something about yourself.  Maybe you'll even--decide whether or not you care to return. Brian raises his hand and then stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I can answer that right now sir...That'd be "No", no for me. 'cause...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sit down Johnson...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you sir... He sits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My office... Vernon points.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...is right across that hall.  Any monkey business is ill-advised... He looks around at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...any questions?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...I got a question. Vernon looks at him suspiciously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does Barry Manilow know you raid his wardrobe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll give you the answer to that question, Mr. Bender, next Saturday. Don't mess with the bull young man, you'll get the horns. Vernon leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That man...is a brownie hound... Everyone tries to get comfortable and we hear a loud snapping sound.  Brian turns and looks and it is Allison, biting her nails. Bender's eyes widen as he turns to look.  Everyone is looking now.  Allison notices them looking at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You keep eating your hand and you're not gonna be hungry for lunch... Allison spits part of her nail at Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen you before, you know... We see Vernon look out from his office. We see Brian playing with his pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who do I think I am?  Who are you? Who are you? He attaches the pen to his bottom lip and puts the top under his upper lip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am a walrus... Bender looks at him in utter confusion.  Brian notices this, laughs and takes the pen out of his mouth-- embarrassed. Bender and Brian begin to take their jackets off at the same time.  They both notice this.  Brian stops removing his jacket. Bender takes his all the way off.  Brian rubs his hands together and pretends to be cold.  He pulls his jacket back on.  He turns and looks at Bender who is still staring at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the shits, huh? Bender glares at him and Brian utters an uncomfortable laugh. Bender turns away and crumples up his essay paper.  He throws it at Claire.  It misses and goes over Claire's head. Andrew and Claire acknowlege it but continue to ignore Bender. Bender starts loudly "singing" the musical part of a song.  Nah, nah, nah, nah, nah, nah...nah, nah, nah...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe this is really happening to me... Bender stops "singing" abruptly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, shit!  What're we s'posed to do if we hafta take a piss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you gotta go... We hear Bender unzip his fly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gotta go! Everyone is now looking at Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (disgusted) Oh my God!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, yer not urinating in here man!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't talk!  Don't talk!  It makes it crawl back up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You whip it out and you're dead before the first drop hits the floor! Bender gasps mockingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're pretty sexy when you get angry...grrr! He turns to Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, homeboy... Brian points at himself with his pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...why don't you go close that door. We'll get the prom queen-- impregnated! Claire turns and glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Bender ignores him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I lose my temper, you're totalled man!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Totally?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Totally!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you just shut up!  Nobody here is interested!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really! (to Claire about Bender) Buttface!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well hey Sporto!  What'd you do to get in here?  Forget to wash your jock?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, excuse me, fellas?  I think we should just write our papers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, just because you live in here doesn't give you the right to be a pain in the ass...so knock it off! Bender mockingly registers pain in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a free country...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's just doing it to get a rise out of you!  Just ignore him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweets...you couldn't ignore me if you tried! Claire rolls her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...so! (to Andrew and Claire) Are you guys like boyfriend/girl- friend? (a beat) Steady dates? (another beat) Lo--vers? (another beat) Come on Sporto, level with me.  Do you slip her the hot...beef... injection? Claire and Andrew turn to face Bender, both furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go to hell!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  What's going on in there? (to himself) Smug little pricks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scumbag! Bender stands up and walks over to the railing.  He sits on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you say we close that door. We can't have any kind of party with Vernon checking us out every few seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you know the door's s'posed to stay open...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why don't you just shut up! There's four other people in here you know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, you can count.  See!  I knew you had to be smart to be a...a wrestler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who the hell are you to judge anybody anyway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, Bender...you don't even count.  I mean if you disappeared forever it wouldn't make any difference.  You may as well not even exist at this school. Bender probably is upset at this and he pauses a moment before speaking.  He doesn't let his emotions out, however.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...I'll just run right out and join the wrestling team. Andrew and Claire look at each other and laugh at Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe the prep club too!  Student council...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, they wouldn't take you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know why guys like you knock everything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, this should be stunning...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's 'cause you're afraid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God!  You ritchies are so smart, that's exactly why I'm not heavy in activities!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a big coward! Brian feels left out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm in the math club...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you're afraid that they won't take you.  You don't belong so you just have to dump all over it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...it wouldn't have anything to do with you activities people being assholes...now would it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well you wouldn't know...You don't even know any of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I don't know any lepers either, but I'm not gonna run out and join one of their fucking clubs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey let's watch the mouth, huh? Brian again feels he needs to contribute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm in the physics club too...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S'cuse me a sec... (to Brian) What are you babbling about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what I said was...I'm in the math club, the Latin club and the physics club...physics club. Bender nods and turns to Claire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey...Cherry...do you belong to the physics club?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's an academic club...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...academic clubs aren't the same as other kinds of clubs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, but to dorks like him... Bender points at Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...they are. (to Brian) What do you guys do in your club?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In physics, um, we ah, we talk about physics...about properties of physics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So it's sorta social...demented and sad, but social.  Right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, I guess you could consider it a social situation.  I mean there are other children in my club and uh, at the end of the year we have, um, you know, a big banquet, at the, uh, at the Hilton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You load up, you party...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no, we get dressed up...I mean, but, we don't...we don't get high.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only burners like you get high...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, uh, I didn't have any shoes. So I had to borrow my dad's.  It was kinda weird 'cause my mom doesn't like me to wear other people's shoes.  And, uh, my cousin Kent...my cousin Kendall from, uh, Indiana... He got high once and you know, he started eating like really weird foods.  And uh, and then he just felt like he didn't belong anywhere. You know, kinda like, you know "Twilight Zone" kinda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you guys keep up your talking and Vernon's gonna come right in here...I got a meet this Saturday and I'm not gonna miss it on account of you boneheads...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh and wouldn't that be a bite... Bender lets out a moan of fake agony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Missing a whole wrestling meet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well you wouldn't know anything about it, faggot!  You never competed in your whole life!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I know...I feel all empty inside because of it.  I have such a deep admiration for guys that roll around on the floor with other guys!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhh...you'd never miss it.  You don't have any goals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, but I do!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanna be just--like--you!  I figure all I need's a labotamy and some tights! Brian becomes interested.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wear tights?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No I don't wear tights, I wear the required uniform...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tights...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! They hear Vernon moving around out in the hall so Bender quickly comes and sits in the chair between Claire and Andrew.  He folds his hands on the table. Vernon goes back into his office.  Bender laughs and gets up.  He starts walking towards the double doors that separate the library from the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know there's not s'posed to be any monkey business! Bender turns and points at Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Young man...have you finished your paper? Bender turns back away and goes to the door.  He looks around cautiously and removes a screw from the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you gonna do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop dead, I hope!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bender, that's, that's school property there...you know, it doesn't belong to us.  It's something not to be toyed with. The door slams shut.  Bender runs back to his seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's very funny, come on, fix it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should really fix that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I a genius?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're an asshole!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a funny guy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fix the door Bender!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone just shhh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been here before, I know what I'm doing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!  Fix the door, get up there and fix it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God damnit! He opens the door and storms in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is that door closed? For a few seconds no one says anything, they just stare at Vernon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is that door closed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How're we s'posed to know?  We're not s'posed to move, right? Vernon turns to Claire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were just sitting here, like we were s'posed to... Vernon looks around and looks at Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who closed that door?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think a screw fell out of it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It just closed, sir... Vernon looks at Allison in the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who? Allison lets out a squeak and slams her face onto the table, hiding in her jacket hood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She doesn't talk, sir...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me that screw...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to yank you outta that seat and shake it out of you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have it...screws fall out all of the time, the world's an imperfect place...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give it to me, Bender...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, sir, why would anybody want to steal a screw?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch it, young lady... Vernon goes over to the door.  He tries to hold it open by putting a folding chair in front of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door's way too heavy, sir. The door slams shut despite the chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God damnit! They laugh. Vernon opens the door again.  He comes back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Andrew Clark...get up here.  Come on, front and center, let's go. Andrew gets up and walks over to Vernon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, how come Andrew gets to get up? If he gets up, we'll all get up, it'll be anarchy! Vernon and Andrew are now attempting to move the steel magazine rack in front of the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, now, watch the magazines!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's out of my hands... They get it into the doorway and it blocks the entire door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's very clever sir, but what if there's a fire?  I think violating fire codes and endangering the lives of children would be unwise at this juncture in your career, sir. Vernon thinks about it.  He turns to Andrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, what are you doing with this?  Get this outta here for God's sake!  What's the matter with you? Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know the school comes equipped with fire exits at either end of the library. Brian points at them and Bender glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show Dick some respect! Andrew and Vernon come back into the main section of the library.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go...go!  Get back into your seat. Andrew sits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expected a little more from a varsity letterman! (to Bender) You're not fooling anybody, Bender! The next screw that falls out is gonna be you! Vernon turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eat my shorts... Vernon spins in his tracks and faces Bender again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eat my shorts!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just bought yourself another Saturday, mister!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Christ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just bought one more right there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm free the Saturday after that...beyond that, I'm gonna have to check my calendar!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good!  'Cause it's gonna be filled, we'll keep goin'!  You want another one?  Say the word, just say the word!  Instead of going to prison, you'll come here!  Are you through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm doing society a favor!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's another one, right now!  I've got you for the rest of your natural born life if you don't watch your step!  You want another one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it!  You got another one, right there!  That's another one pal!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut it out! Claire mouths the word "Stop" to Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You through?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not even close, bud!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good!  You got one more, right there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you really think I give a shit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another... Bender glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You through?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's seven including the one when we first came in and you asked Mr. Vernon here whether Barry Manilow knew that he raided his closet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now it's eight... (to Brian) You stay out of it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, sir, it's seven!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up, Peewee! (to Bender) You're mine Bender...for two months I gotcha!  I gotcha!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I say?  I'm thrilled!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm sure that's exactly what you want these people to believe.  You know something, Bender?  You ought to spend a little more time trying to do something with yourself and a little less time trying to impress people.  You might be better off. (to everyone) Alright, that's it!  I'm going to be right outside those doors.  The next time I hafta come in here...I'm cracking skulls!  (Bender mouths Im cracking skulls) Vernon leaves and closes the door.  A musical riff builds to a climax as Bender screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! We see the clock, it reads a quarter to eight. We see Bender, lighting his shoe on fire and lighting a cigarette with his shoe. We see Claire thinking. We see Brian playing with his balls. We see Andrew playing with his sweatshirt. We see Allison pulling a string around her finger and making it turn purple. We see Bender put the flames on his shoe out.  He then plays air guitar. We see Allison drawing. We see Andrew playing paper football.  He cheers silently. Allison shakes dandruff from her hair onto her picture. We see everyone fall asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wake up!  Who has to go to the lavatory? Everyone raises their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's real intelligent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right...it's wrong to destroy literature... He continues to tear pages out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's such fun to read...and, Molet really pumps my nads!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mol-yare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love his work. Bender tosses the rest of the pages at Brian.  He picks up the card catalogue drawer and begins to take cards out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big deal...nothing to do when you're locked in a vacancy..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speak for yourself...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think I'd speak for you?  I don't even know your language! Andrew turns to Claire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you grounded tonight? Claire shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, my mom said I was but by dad told me to just blow her off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big party at Stubbies, parents are in Europe.  Should be pretty wild...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, can you go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I doubt it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well 'cause if I do what my mother tells me not to do, it's because because my father says it's okay. There's like this whole big monster deal, it's endless and it's a total drag.  It's like any minute... divorce...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who do you like better?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like your old man better than your mom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're both strict.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I mean, if you had to choose between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dunno, I'd probably go live with my brother.  I mean, I don't think either one of them gives a shit about me...it's like they use me just to get back at each other. Suddenly, from the back of the room.  Allison speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha!!! Everyone looks at her shocked.  Allison blows her hair out of her eyes and grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're just feeling sorry for yourself...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well if I didn't nobody else would.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw...you're breaking my heart...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sporto...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Bender jumps down and goes next to Andrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get along with your parents?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well if I say yes, I'm an idiot, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're an idiot anyway...But if you say you get along with your parents well you're a liar too! Bender turns and walks away from him.  Andrew follows and pushes Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know something, man...If we weren't in school right now, I'd waste you! Bender points his middle finger at the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you hear this?  Want me to turn it up? Bender flips his hand around so he is now giving Andrew the bird. Brian comes over and puts a hand on each of the guy's shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey fellas, I mean... Andrew pushes away from Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I don't like my parents either, I don't...I don't get along with them...their idea of parental compassion is just, you know, wacko! Bender turns to Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dork...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are a parent's wet dream, okay? Bender starts to walk away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well that's a problem!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I can see you getting all bunged up for them making you wear these kinda clothes.  But face it, you're a Neo-Maxi-Zoom-Dweebie! What would you be doing if you weren't out making yourself a better citizen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you have to insult everybody?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm being honest, asshole!  I would expect you...to know the difference!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah well, he's gotta name!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, (to Brian) What's your name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brian...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My condolences... Bender walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's yours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Claire...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ka-Laire?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Claire...it's a family name!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nooo...It's a fat girl's name!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well thank you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not fat!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well not at present but I could see you really pushing maximum density! You see, I'm not sure if you know this...but there are two kinds of fat people.  There's fat people that were born to be fat, and then there's fat people that were once thin but they became fat...so when you look at them you can sorta see that thin person inside!  You see, you're gonna get married, you're gonna squeeze out a few puppies and then, uh... He mimes becoming fat, making noises. Claire gives him the finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh...obscene finger gestures from such a pristine girl!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not that pristine! Bender bends down closer to Claire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you a virgin? (a beat) I'll bet you a million dollars that you are!  Let's end the suspense! Is it gonna be... (another beat) ...a white weddin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you just shut up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever kissed a boy on the mouth? (a beat) Have you ever been felt up?  Over the bra, under the blouse, shoes off...hoping to God your parents don't walk in? Claire is getting upset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want me to puke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over the panties, no bra, blouse unbuttoned, Calvin's in a ball on the front seat past eleven on a school night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave her alone! Bender slowly stands and faces Andrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said leave her alone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gonna make me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... Bender walks over to where Andrew is standing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You and how many of your friends?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just me, just you and me.  Two hits. Me hitting you, you hitting the floor!  Anytime you're ready, pal! Bender goes to hit him but Andrew gets Bender down on the ground with a wrestling move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't wanna get into to this with you man... Andrew gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not? Bender gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cause I'd kill you...It's real simple. I'd kill you and your fucking parents would sue me and it would be a big mess and I don't care enough about you to bother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chicken shit... Andrew turns and walks away.  Bender takes out a switchblade and opens it. He stabs the switchblade into a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's end this right now.  You don't talk to her...you don't look at her and you don't even think about her! You understand me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm trying to help her!. We see the janitor, CARL come into the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brian, how you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your dad works here? Brian is embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, Carl?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I ask you a question?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How does one become a janitor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna be a janitor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No I just wanna know how one becomes a janitor because Andrew here, is very interested in persuing a career in the custodial arts...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, really?  You guys think I'm just some untouchable peasant?  Peon? Huh?  Maybe so, but following a broom around after shitheads like you for the past eight years I've learned a couple of things...I look through your letters, I look through your lockers...I listen to your conversations, you don't know that but I do...I am the eyes and ears of this institution my friends.  By the way, that clock's twenty minutes fast! Everyone groans.  Bender smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Allright girls, that's thirty minutes for lunch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I think the cafeteria would be a more suitable place for us to eat lunch in, sir!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I don't care what you think, Andrew!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, Dick?  Excuse me, Rich...will milk be made available to us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're extremely thirsty sir...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a very low tolerance for dehydration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen her dehydrate sir, it's pretty gross. Bender stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax, I'll get it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, ah, ah grab some wood there, bub! Bender grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think, I was born yesterday?  You think I'm gonna have you roaming these halls? He points at Andrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! He points at Allison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you!  Hey!  What's her name? Wake her!  Wake her up! (to Allison) Come on, on your feet missy!  Let's go!  This is no rest home! Allison gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a soft drink machine in the teacher's lounge.  Lets go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, what's your poison? Allison doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you drink? Allison still doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay...forget I asked... Allison waits for two beats and then speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vodka...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vodka?  When do you drink vodka?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whenever...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lot? Allison smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tons...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that why you're here today? Allison doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you here? Allison snaps back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you here? They stop walking and Andrew leans against the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, I'm here today...because uh, because my coach and my father don't want me to blow my ride.  See I get treated differently because uh, Coach thinks I'm a winner.  So does my old man.  I'm not a winner because I wanna be one... I'm a winner because I got strength and speed.  Kinda like a race horse. That's about how involved I am in what's happening to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?  That's very interesting. Now why don't you tell me why you're really in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Claire...you wanna see a picture of a guy with elephantitus of the nuts? It's pretty tasty...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thank you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you think he rides a bike? Claire rolls her eyes and turns away in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Claire...would you ever consider dating a guy like this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't you just leave me alone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean if he had a great personality and was a good dancer and had a cool car...Although you'd probably have to ride in the back seat 'cause his nuts would ride shotgun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what I wish I was doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Op, watch what you say, Brian here is a cherry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A cherry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish I was on a plane to France.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a cherry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When have you ever gotten laid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've laid, lotsa times!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name one!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She lives in Canada, met her at Niagra Falls.  You wouldn't know her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ever laid anyone around here. Brian shushes Bender and points at Claire whos back is still turned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothin', nothin! (to Bender) Let's just drop it, we'll talk about it later!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!  Drop what, what're you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Brian's trying to tell me that in addition to the number of girls in the Niagra Falls area, that presently you and he are, riding the hobby horse!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little pig!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No I'm not!  I'm not!  John said I was a cherry and I said I wasn't, that's it, that's all that was said!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well then what were you motioning to Claire for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I don't appreciate this very much, Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is lying!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh you weren't motioning to Claire?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know he's lying, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Were you or were you not motioning to Claire?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but it was only...was only because I didn't want her to know that I was a virgin, okay? Bender just stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me for being a virgin, I'm sorry... Claire laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you want me to know you were a virgin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because it's personal business, it's my personal, private business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well Brian, it doesn't sound like you're doing any business...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's okay for a guy to be a virgin... Bender looks suprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do? Claire smiles and nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's in there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guess, where's your lunch?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're wearing it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're nauseating... Bender grabs a Coke and tosses it over to Allison who catches it without even looking up. Bender then watches Claire set up a sushi platter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sushi...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sushi?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rice, uh, raw fish and seaweed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You won't accept a guys tongue in your mouth and you're gonna eat that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I eat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know...give it a try... We now watch Andrew take a couple sandwiches out of his bag, a bag of potato chips, an apple, a banana, a bag of cookies and a carton of milk. Allison opens her Coke and it fizzes over.  She loudly slurps it up off the table and her fingers. Andrew sees Bender looking at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your problem? Allison opens her sandwich and and tosses the meat up. It lands on the sculpture above. She opens some pixie stix and pours the sugar on the sandwich and then puts Cap'n Crunch on top of that. She crushes the sandwich together and loudly eats it. Bender goes over and sits by Brian, Bender takes Brian's bag lunch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're we having?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, it's your standard, regular lunch I guess... Bender reaches in the bag and pulls out a thermos.  He sets it on the table and points at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milk?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Soup. Bender goes in again and pulls out a juice box. Brian reaches toward the bag and Bender slaps his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's apple juice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can read!  PB & J with the crusts cut off...Well Brian, this is a very nutritous lunch, all the food groups are represented.  Did your mom marry Mr. Rogers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, no, Mr. Johnson...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhh.... Andrew and Claire smile at each other.  Bender stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's my impression of life at big Bri's house... (in a loud and friendly voice) Son! (in a kiddie voice) Yeah Dad? (loud) How's your day, pal? (kiddie) Great Dad, how's yours? (loud) Super, say son, how'd you like to go fishing this weekend? (kiddie) Great Dad, but I've got homework to do! (loud) That's alright son, you can do it, on the boat! (kiddie) Geee!!! (loud) Dear, isn't our son swell? (quiet and motherly) Yes Dear, isn't life swell? Bender mimes mother kissing father and then father kissing mother and then father punching mother in the face. Suddenly it's not so funny anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, what about your family?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, mine?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's real easy! Bender stands again and points forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stupid, worthless, no good, God damned, freeloading, son of a bitch, retarded, bigmouth, know it all, asshole, jerk! (as his mother) You forgot ugly, lazy and disrespectful. Bender slams his hand back to slap his invisable mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up bitch!  Go fix me a turkey pot pie! (as himself) What about you Dad? (as his father) Fuck you! (as himself) No, Dad, what about you? (as his father) Fuck you! (as himself--yelling) No, Dad, what about you? (as his father--yelling) Fuck you! He reaches out and pretend he's his father hitting him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that for real?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna come over sometime?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's bullshit.  It's all part of your image, I don't believe a word of it. Bender actually looks hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't believe me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I stutter? Bender comes over to Andrew and rolls up his right sleeve to reveal a circular shaped burn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you believe this?  Huh?  It's about the size of a cigar...Do I stutter?  You see, this is what you get in my house when you spill paint in the garage. Bender begins to walk away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See I don't think that I need to sit here with you fuckin' dildos anymore! Bender walks over to a map table and throws all the maps on the floor.  He climbs up on top of the table and then up to the second floor balcony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't have said that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How would I know, I mean he lies about everything anyway!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, shit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coffee...looks like they scrape it off the bottom of the Mississippi river.  Everything's polluted, everything's polluted...the coffee. Bender comes out of the library doors followed bye veryone else. Bender and Claire are walking next to each other. Brian and Andrew are walking next to each other and at the end of the line, Allison is following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know where Vernon went?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well then, how do you know when he'll be back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't...being bad feels pretty good, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the point in going to Bender's locker?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beats me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is so stupid...Why do you think, why are we risking getting caught?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dunno...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So then what are we doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ask me one more question and I'm beating the shit out of you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry... Bender opens his locker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slob!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My maid's on vacation. Bender pulls out a bag of marijuana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drugs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Screw that Bender...put it back! Bender walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drugs...the boy had marijuana. Claire walks after Bender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was marijuana!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Andrew follows the other two.  Brian looks at Allison who is standing there with her mouth open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you approve of this? Brian turns and leaves.  Allison steals the lock off of Bender's locker. We see the crowd walking down the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll cross through the lab, and then we'll double back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You better be right, if Vernon cuts us off it's your fault, asshole!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd he say?  Where're we going? They see Vernon down one of the halls.  We have various sequences of them running around and seeing Vernon until they stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!  Wait, hold it!  Hold it!  We have to go through the cafeteria!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, the activities hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey man, you don't know what you're talking about!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No you don't know what you're talking about! Allison squeaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now we're through listening to you, we're going this way. They all go Andrew's way and run into a hall closed by an iron gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great idea Jagoff!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you!  Why didn't you listen to John?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're dead!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, just me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back to the library, keep your unit on this! Bender puts his bag of marijuana into Brian's underwear. Bender runs away singing loudly.  I wanna be an airborne ranger... We see Vernon hear Bender. The rest of them run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That son of a bitch! We see Vernon looking for Bender until he finds him in the gym. Bender is going up for a basket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three...two...one! He dunks the ball.  Vernon enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bender!  Bender!  Bender!  What is this?  What are you doing here, what is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out!  That's it Bender!  Out, it's over!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you wanna hear my excuse?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm thinking of trying out for a scholarship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gimmie the ball, Bender. Bender fakes the ball at Vernon.  He then sets the ball down and rolls it at Vernon who kicks it back at him. They leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get your stuff, let's go! (to everyone) Mr. Wiseguy here has taken it upon himself to go to the gymnasium.  I'm sorry to inform you, you're going to be without his services for the rest of the day.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : 2. INT. CLAIRE'S CAR - DAY We see CLAIRE and her FATHER sitting in their car in the parking lot. Claire is the prom queen and is clearly a snob.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 3. INT. BRIAN'S CAR - DAY We are in BRIAN's car.  His MOTHER is there and so is his little SISTER.  He is sort of a nerd.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 4. INT. ANDREW'S CAR - DAY We see ANDREW and his FATHER.  Andrew is clearly a jock; hes wearing a lettermans jacket with lots of patches on it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 5. EXT. SHERMER PARKING LOT - DAY We see JOHN BENDER walking towards us.  He is wearing sunglasses.  A car is coming towards him but he doesn't stop walking. The car slams on its breaks directly in front of him. Bender gets out of the frame.  Out of the car steps ALLISON.  She is dressed all in black.  She steps forward to look in the car's front window and the car drives away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 6. INT. LIBRARY - DAY There are six tables in two rows of three. Claire is sitting at the front table.  Brian comes in and sits at the table behind her. Andrew comes in and points at the chair next to Claire at the front table.  She shrugs and he sits there. In walks Bender, he touches everything on the checkout desk and takes a few things in the process. He walks over to where Brian is sitting and points to the table on the opposite side of the Library.  Brian reluctantly gets up and moves. Bender sits at the table where Brian was and puts his feet up. Allison walks in.  She walks all the way around the library and sits in the back corner table, just behind Brian. Andrew and Claire look at each other and snicker. Brian looks at her in confusion and then turns away. Enter RICHARD VERNON, a teacher.  He holds a stack of papers in his left hand.  He addresses the group with such disrespect it makes you wonder how he ever got the job.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 7. INT. VERNON'S OFFICE - DAY We see Vernon in his office.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 8. INT. LIBRARY - DAY They all look at each other.  Andrew turns away from Bender.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 9. INT. HALLWAY - DAY We see Vernon getting a drink at the fountain. He stands up and checks the way he looks in a mirror.  He does a muscular pose and utters some manly jibberish Cobadonga!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 10. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Brian looks up.  Bender is messing with the door to the library.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 11. INT. HALLWAY - DAY We see Vernon walking back to his office.  He stops and listens to them through the closed door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 12. INT. LIBRARY - DAY We see Brian as we hear Vernon in the hall.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 13. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Later. Vernon is standing there staring at the sleeping kids.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 14. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Later. We see the clock, it now says 10:22. We see Andrew stretching.  We see Bender tearing pages out of a book.  He is tossing them around.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 15. INT. VERNON'S OFFICE - DAY The clock says 11:30.  Vernon gets up and leaves.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 16. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Bender starts to whistle a marching tune and everybody joins in. Vernon enters.  Bender begins to whistle Beethoven's 5th.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 16. INT. HALLWAY - DAY Andrew and Allison are walking in the hall.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 17. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Claire and Bender and Brian are all sitting around waiting for the Cokes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, you and Claire, did it! Claire spins around.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 18.  INT. LIBRARY - DAY Later. Everybody has lunches now. Claire begins to take hers out of a small shopping bag.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 19. INT. VERNON'S OFFICE - DAY Vernon puts an orange in his mouth and then attempts to pour coffee out of his thermos.  The top comes off and the coffee goes all over his desk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 20. INT. HALLWAY - DAY Vernon walks into the hallway, talking to himself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 21. INT. LIBRARY - DAY The rest of the kids are all sitting back in their seats when Bender and Vernon enter.  Vernon pushes Bender.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Everything's a big joke, huh Bender? The false alarm you pulled, Friday, false alarms are really funny, aren't they...What if your home, what if your family... (a beat) ...what if your dope was on fire?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impossible, sir...It's in Johnson's underwear... Andrew laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think he's funny?  You think this is cute?  You think he's bitchin', is that it?  Lemme tell you something.  Look at him, he's a bum. (to everybody) You wanna see something funny?  You go visit John Bender in five years! You'll see how God damned funny he is! (to Bender) What's the matter, John?  You gonna cry?  Let's go... Vernon grabs Bender's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey keep your fuckin' hands off me! I expect better manners from you, Dick! Bender takes his sunglasses out of his pocket and lays them in front of Andrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For better hallway vision! Bender leaves but not before pushing stuff over on the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the last time, Bender.  That's the last time you ever make me look bad in front of those kids, do you hear me?  I make $31,000 dollars a year and I have a home and I'm not about to throw it away on some punk like you...But someday, man, someday. When you're outta here and you've forgotten all about this place... And they've forgotten all about you and you're wrapped up in your own pathetic life...I'm gonna be there. That's right.  And I'm gonna kick the living shit out of you, man, I'm gonna knock your dick in the dirt!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you threatening me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you gonna do about it?  You think anybody's gonna believe you? You think anybody's gonna take your word over mine?  I'm a man of respect around here.  They love me around here, I'm a swell guy...you're a lying sack of shit!  And everybody knows it.  Oh, you're a real tough guy...come on, come on...get on your feet, pal!  Let's find out how tough you are!  I wanna know right now, how tough you are!  Come on! I'll give you the first punch, let's go!  Come on, right here, just take the first shot!  Please, I'm begging you, take a shot!  Come on, just take one shot, that's all I need, just one swing... Bender just sits there staring at Vernon.  Vernon fakes a punch and Bender flinches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I though...you're a gutless turd! Vernon leaves and locks the closet door after him. Bender climbs into a hatch in the ceiling and disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A naked blond walks into a bar, with a poodle under one arm and a two foot salami under the other.  She lays the poodle on the table.  Bar- tender says: "I suppose you won't be needing a drink."  The naked lady says... The ceiling under Bender gives and he falls through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit!!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ, allmighty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I forgot my pencil... We hear Vernon in the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God damnit!  What in God's name is going on in here? Vernon enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that ruckus?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, what ruckus?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was just in my office and I heard a ruckus!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you describe the ruckus, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch your tongue young man, watch it! We see Bender under the table by Claire's legs.  He sits up and bangs his head on the table.  He groans. Above the table, Andrew and Claire try to take credit for the noise by making more noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?  What, what is that, what is that noise? Under the table, Bender looks between Claire's legs and can see her panties.  He puts his head between Claire's legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What noise?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really, sir, there wasn't any noise... Claire squeels.  She squeezes Bender's head between her knees. Everyone starts faking a coughing fit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That noise?  Was that the noise you were talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it wasn't.  That was not the noise I was talking about.  Now, I may not have caught you in the act this time, but you can bet I will. Allison laughs at Vernon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You make book on that missy! (to Claire) And you!  I will not be made a fool of! He turns and walks away.  We see that he still has the toilet seat cover stuck to his pants. Vernon leaves. Everyone laughs except Claire who lets Bender out to a barage of slaps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was an accident!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're an asshole!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So sue me... Bender gets up and walks over to Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, Ahab...Kybo Mein Doobage... Brian gives Bender his bag of marajuana.  Bender turns and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo waistoid...you're not gonna blaze up in here! Claire gets up and goes after him.  Then Brian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit... Andrew goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chicks, cannot hold der smoke!  That's what it is!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know how popular I am?  I'm so popular, everybody loves me so much, at this school...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Poor baby. Brian waves Claire over to him and he falls over. We see Andrew emerge from a really smokey room.  He inhales another puff and then starts dancing to everybody's applause. He goes back in the room he was in.  He screams and it shatters the glass in the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mister, oh mister Tearney...a history of slight mental illness? Wooh, no wonder he's so fucked up! Carl enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Afternoon, Dick...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Carl, how you doin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, what's up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not much, what's happening, what are you doing in the basement files?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, nothin' nothin' here.  I'm just doin' a little homework here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Homework, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... Carl, laughing, comes over and looks at the files that Vernon was looking at.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Confidential files...hmmm?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, Carl...this is a highly sensitive area and I, I tell you something...certain people would be very very embarrassed.  I would really appreciate it if if if if this would be something that, that you and I could keep between us...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you gonna do for me, man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, well what would you like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got fifty bucks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fifty bucks...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No no man, no; you got a middle name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, guess... Allison suddenly takes interest in the conversation and as she speaks, she moves over and sits next to the two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your middle name is Ralph, as in puke... Brian and Andrew look at her in confusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...your birthday is March 12th, you're five-nine and a half you weigh a hundred and thirty pounds and your social security number is
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : 21. INT. CLOSET - DAY Vernon has put Bender in a closet and is in there talking to him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 22. INT. HEATING DUCT - DAY Bender is slowly crawling through a heating duct.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 23. INT. FACILTY BATHROOM - DAY We see the door to the bathroom.  We hear Vernon inside.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: . INT. LIBRARY - DAY Bender walks down the stairs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 25. INT. STAIRS - DAY We see Vernon go down the stairs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 26. INT. LIBRARY - DAY Brian, Bender and Claire are sitting in a circle and laughing hysterically. Bender lights Claire up and she coughs the smoke out. Brian laughs at her.  He exhales and tries to eat the smoke.  He talks in a really weird voice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 27. INT. BASEMENT - DAY Vernon is glancing through the confidential files in the school basement.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : 28. INT. LIBRARY - DAY We see Andrew and Brian laughing.  Allison is hanging out over by the statue in the back of the library.
dialogue.name: dialogue
